Title: Directs the director of the division of minority and women's business development to provide for the minority and women-owned business certification of business entities owned by Indian nations or tribes
Summary: Directs the director of the division of minority and women's business development to provide for the minority and women-owned business certification of business entities owned by Indian nations or tribes.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to directing the director of the division of minority and women's business development to provide for the certification of certain business entities owned by an Indian nation or tribe for participation in the minority and women owned business enterprise program
